updateActorXY() - Method in class com.horse.pokemon.ObjectData.Players.User
Sets the position of the Actor part of the User relative to the position values so that the MainGameScreen.camera can follow the User properly, as the positions inside User are offset because the position is the bottom left corner of the User.

User - Class in com.horse.pokemon.ObjectData.Players
The User class represents the protagonist of the Pokemon game.
User(MainGameScreen) - Constructor for class com.horse.pokemon.ObjectData.Players.User
Main class constructor that initializes all non-static-final representatives to ensure no NullPointerException occurs, which prepares the User for movement and animation.
USER_ATLAS_REGION_NAME - Static variable in class com.horse.pokemon.ObjectData.Players.User
The String representing the name of all the sprites of the User for all movements and standard actions according to User.USER_INFORMATION
USER_BASE_X_POSITION - Static variable in class com.horse.pokemon.BattleEngine.BackgroundSetup
 
USER_BASE_Y_POSITION - Static variable in class com.horse.pokemon.BattleEngine.BackgroundSetup
 
USER_INFORMATION - Static variable in class com.horse.pokemon.ObjectData.Players.User
The String representing the location of the Texture Packer file of all the compact images of the User.
USER_SWIM_HEIGHT - Static variable in class com.horse.pokemon.ObjectData.Players.User
The byte representing the amount of pixels from the upper-most part of the User to the bottom-most part of the User when in the PlayerActions PlayerActions.SWIMMING or PlayerActions.IDLE if the User is on water, also determining how big the user is drawn every frame y-wise.
USER_SWIM_WIDTH - Static variable in class com.horse.pokemon.ObjectData.Players.User
The byte representing the amount of pixels from the left-most part of the User to the right-most part of the User when in the PlayerActions PlayerActions.SWIMMING or PlayerActions.IDLE if the User is on water, also determining how big the user is drawn every frame x-wise.
USER_WALK_HEIGHT - Static variable in class com.horse.pokemon.ObjectData.Players.User
The byte representing the amount of pixels from the upper-most part of the User to the bottom-most part of the User when in the PlayerActions PlayerActions.WALKING or PlayerActions.IDLE if the User is on land, also determining how big the user is draw every frame y-wise.
USER_WALK_WIDTH - Static variable in class com.horse.pokemon.ObjectData.Players.User
The byte representing the amount of pixels from the left-most part of the User to the right-most part of the User when in the PlayerActions PlayerActions.WALKING or PlayerActions.IDLE if the User is on land, also determining how big the user is drawn every frame x-wise.

userBaseTexture - Variable in class com.horse.pokemon.BattleEngine.BackgroundData
 
userIdleOnLand - Static variable in class com.horse.pokemon.ObjectData.Players.User
The TextureRegion array representing all of the idle positions when the User is on land.
userIdleOnWater - Static variable in class com.horse.pokemon.ObjectData.Players.User
The TextureRegion array representing all of the idle positions when the User is on water.
userRun - Static variable in class com.horse.pokemon.ObjectData.Players.User
The Animation array representing all of the movement frames for when the User is on land and is quickly moving.
userSprite - Static variable in class com.horse.pokemon.ObjectData.Players.User
The Sprite representing the area of the User.USER_INFORMATION to be used for movements using User.USER_ATLAS_REGION_NAME to get the Texture Packer information to have easy access to the x, y, width, and height of the sprite sheet.
userSwim - Static variable in class com.horse.pokemon.ObjectData.Players.User
The Animation array representing all of the movement frames for when the User is on water.
userWalk - Static variable in class com.horse.pokemon.ObjectData.Players.User
The Animation array representing all of the movement frames for when the User is on land and is moving at a steady pace.
